articles.title: Ukraine war: EU bans imports of most Russian oil - CTV News
articles.description: The European Union's groundbreaking decision to ban nearly all oil from Russia to punish the country for its invasion of Ukraine is a blow to Moscow's economy, but its effects may be blunted by rising energy prices and other countries willing to buy some of t…
articles.content:
BRUSSELS -
